hero.headline: Ahmed Ammouri - Professional Backend Developer
hero.subheadline: Software developer with 6 years of experience, specializing in the design and development of robust and scalable applications. Passionate about modern backend architectures, microservices, and cloud technologies.

cgm.title: Backend Engineer
cgm.detail1: Design, development and maintenance of CGM Studio, a cloud platform dedicated to healthcare professionals in Italy.
cgm.detail2: Backend development within a microservices architecture, ensuring scalability and performance of the application.
cgm.detail3: Optimization and maintenance of services to ensure high availability and optimal performance.
cgm.detail4: Close collaboration with product, frontend and DevOps teams to guarantee technical alignment with the needs of healthcare professionals.
cgm.detail5: Participation in architectural choices to improve the robustness and flexibility of the application.
cgm.detail6: Improvement of medical practice management tools: management of patient records, appointment scheduling, and automation of administrative tasks.

socgen.title: Full Stack Engineer
socgen.detail1: Development and maintenance of Risk Metric Management, an application for managing users, access rights and workflows related to risk management.
socgen.detail2: Design and implementation of the software architecture using a full-stack approach.
socgen.detail3: Collaboration with business and technical teams to align the application with risk management needs.
socgen.detail4: Performance optimization and redesign of key features to improve the user experience and system reliability.

capgemini.title: Software Engineer
capgemini.detail1: Development and maintenance of a functional administration platform integrated with the Dassault Systèmes PLM 3DExperience solution.
capgemini.detail2: Design and implementation of a robust architecture enabling efficient management of business processes related to 3DX.
capgemini.detail3: Integration and adaptation of the platform to the specific needs of 3DX to ensure a smooth and efficient experience.
capgemini.detail4: Collaboration with business and technical teams to ensure alignment of functionalities with EDF requirements.
capgemini.detail5: Continuous improvement of the platform by optimizing performance and ensuring long-term scalability.

mappa.title: Freelance Software Engineer
mappa.detail1: Designing, developing, and maintaining a subscription-based application for Mappa Assurance.
mappa.detail2: Improving development workflows and promoting modern engineering best practices.
mappa.detail3: Working closely with business and technical teams to ensure feature alignment with operational requirements.
mappa.detail4: Implementing CI/CD pipelines to streamline deployment and enhance development agility.
mappa.detail5: Leading code reviews and mentoring junior developers to foster technical growth and maintain code quality.

contact.title: Got a project? Let's talk.
contact.description: I’m always open to discussing new projects and collaborations. Feel free to reach out!

footer.slogan: Innovative and high-performing web solutions for a digital future.
